title: Happy Birthday, Mari!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Shēngrì kuàilè! Happy birthday, Mari!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thanks, Lanzhu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Hehehe... Mari, put this on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hm? This is a... harness?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s right! Lanzhu heard that you love dynamic activities like bungee jumping and aerial trapezing from a helicopter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! That’s right, that’s right~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So, we’re going to have a thrilling day together! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wonderful!! What are we gonna be doing together!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s still a secret. The hint is that harness. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What a great surprise! I’m down for anything~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
